text: Černěves is a village and municipality (obec) in Litoměřice District in the Ústí nad Labem Region of the Czech Republic. The municipality covers an area of , and has a population of 226 (as at 31 December 2007). Černěves lies approximately south-east of Litoměřice, south-east of Ústí nad Labem, and north of Prague. It is about 3 km from Roudnice nad Labem. ==References== *Czech Statistical Office: Municipalities of Litoměřice District ==External links== * Short official information about the village (in Czech) Category:Villages in Litoměřice District
title: Černěves
